title: Can a younger sister teach her elder brother Quran, Tajweed, & Prayer | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: uh she says that is there any problem for a younger sister to teach her four-year-older brother the quran the tajweed the prayer there is no problem none whatsoever and i don't know of any muslim in his right mind who would say that there is a problem there is no problem in you teaching your father and your grandfather or your uncles or your nephews this is one of the greatest deeds that you can ever do for the sake of allah
